ERROR.YOUR_SESSION_HAS_EXPIRED: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
ERROR.LOGIN_FAILED: An unexpected error occurred during login.
ERROR.LOGOUT_FAILED: An unexpected error occurred during logout.
ERROR.USER_NOT_ASSIGNED_TO_ANY_ROLE: User is not assigned to any role.
ERROR.GETTING_ACCOUNT_DATA_FAILED: An unexpected error occurred while fetching account data.
ERROR.GETTING_USER_DATA_FAILED: An unexpected error occurred while fetching user data.
ERROR.EDIT_ACCOUNT_FAILED: An unexpected error occurred while editing account data.
ERROR.NOT_THE_SAME_PASSWORD: The new password fields do not match.
ERROR.INCORRECT_PASSWORD_RULES: The new password must have: at least 8 characters, at least 1 lowercase letter, at least 1 uppercase letter, at least 1 digit, and at least 1 special character.
ERROR.PASSWORD_RESET_FAILED: An unexpected error occurred while resetting the password.
ERROR.DATA_SET_SHOULD_BE_CSV: The dataset should be in CSV format.
ERROR.DATA_SET_UPLOAD_FAILED: An unexpected error occurred while uploading the dataset.
ERROR.DATA_SET_PREDICTION_FAILED: An unexpected error occurred while verifying the website address.
ERROR.GETTING_DATA_SET_LIST_FAILED: An unexpected error occurred while retrieving the dataset list.
ERROR.DOWNLOADING_DATA_SET_FAILED: An unexpected error occurred while downloading the dataset.
ERROR.UPDATING_DATA_SET_ACTIVITY_FAILED: An unexpected error occurred while activating the dataset.
ERROR.DELETING_DATA_SET_FAILED: An unexpected error occurred while deleting the dataset.
ERROR.DATASETS_ARE_NOT_THE_SAME: The datasets are not the same.

SUCCESS.DATA_SET_ADDED: The data set has been added.
SUCCESS.DATA_SET_ACTIVITY_UPDATED: The data set has been activated.
SUCCESS.DATA_SET_DELETED: The data set has been deleted.
